channel.title: Properties of the Cartesian Product :: Maximum Mathematics
channel.description: The Cartesian Product of two sets is just another set. This means we can also use other set operations like union, intersection, and set differences. In this section, we explore how the Cartesian Product interacts with the other set operators. Associativity of the Cartesian Product We already discussed how order matters in Cartesian Products, and as such sets donâ€™t commute around the Cartesian Product operator $\times$. Associativity is another common property we should examine. What exactly is the difference between
